title: Harmonica
description: Mouth Organ is a western Music Instrument also know as harmonica or blues harp. At Surabhi Music Academy we are teaching on Diatonic,Tremolo and chromatic harmonica.

classes.title: Beginners
lessons: Different Alankars based on different taal

classes.title: Intermediate
lessons: Playing Filmi Songs on mouth organ

classes.title: Advanced
lessons: Playing songs on karaoke tracks etc.

title: Flute
description: At Surabhi music academy, we follow Pdt. Hariprasad Chaurasia's style of playing Hindustani Classical Music. Natural Bamboo flutes are used for training due to their superb acoustic and tonal qualities.

classes.title: Beginners
lessons: How to hold flute, posture correction
Various Alankar and practice on Flute
Playing Alankar on Flute with Tabla

classes.title: Intermediate
lessons: Meend and Gamak Techniques on Flute
Introduction to Raagdari and playing raga on flute

classes.title: Advanced
lessons: Proper demonstration of Alap, Jod & Composition playing with tabla
Playing Filmi Songs based on Raga
